content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

-- read payment type json file
SELECT *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS payment_type;

--  Give column name using json value 

    SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type')AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
           CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,'$.payment_type_desc')AS VARCHAR(15))payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS payment_type;


-- Run stored procedure for see column details

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,''$.payment_type'')AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
           CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc,''$.payment_type_desc'')AS VARCHAR(15))payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''payment_type.json'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''1.0'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ''0x0b'',
        FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b'',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''0x0a''
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS payment_type';
